hero.title2: Find out before a hacker does.

providers.title: We detect keys from major providers

features.title: How it works
features.subtitle: From URL to security report in under a minute
features.step1Desc: Paste your website or application URL
features.step2Desc: We scan source code, scripts, and network requests
features.step3Desc: Get a report with vulnerabilities and how to fix them

detection.title: What we detect
detection.subtitle: A complete analysis of your frontend security

cta.title: Ready to protect your app?
cta.subtitle: Don't wait for someone to discover your vulnerabilities. Scan now.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SecureScan
faq.q1: Is it safe to scan my site?
faq.a1: Yes, completely. We only analyze the public content of your website, just like any visitor would. We don't store any credentials found.
faq.q2: What types of API keys do you detect?
faq.a2: We detect over 40 types of keys: OpenAI, Stripe, AWS, Firebase, GitHub, Supabase, and many more. We also identify generic token and secret patterns.
faq.a3: The basic version is free to help the developer community. We offer premium features like scheduled scans and continuous monitoring.
faq.q4: What do I do if vulnerabilities are found?
faq.a4: We provide detailed instructions for each issue. Most importantly: immediately rotate exposed keys and move them to server environment variables.

footer.tagline: Protecting your code, one API key at a time.

vulnerability.unlockForSolution: Unlock the full report to see the solution

paywall.title: Unlock Full Report

ai.title: Fix everything with AI
ai.subtitle: Copy this prompt and paste it in Claude or ChatGPT
ai.promptNeed1: 1. Exact code or configuration to fix each vulnerability
ai.promptNeed2: 2. Examples for my platform (Vercel, Netlify, Apache, Nginx, etc.)
ai.promptNeed3: 3. Brief explanation of why each solution works

section1.title: 1. Information we collect
section1.intro: SecureScan collects the following information when you use our service:
section1.item3: Payment information processed securely by Stripe
section1.item4: Email address (if you make a purchase)

section2.title: 2. How we use your information
section2.intro: We use the collected information to:
section2.item3: Improve our service and detection algorithms
section2.item4: Communicate with you about your purchase

section3.title: 3. Data security
section3.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information. Payments are processed securely by Stripe and we never store credit card data on our servers.

section4.title: 4. Data retention
section4.content: Scan results are stored for 30 days so you can access them. After this period, data is automatically deleted.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.item3: Object to processing of your data

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
section1.content: By using SecureScan, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you must not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Service description
section2.content: SecureScan is a web security analysis service that scans websites for common vulnerabilities, exposed API keys, missing security headers, and other security issues.

section3.title: 3. Permitted use
section3.intro: You may only use SecureScan to:
section3.item2: Scan websites for which you have express authorization
section3.warning: Using the service for malicious or illegal activities is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of liability
section4.content: SecureScan is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that scanning will detect all existing vulnerabilities. The user is responsible for verifying results and taking appropriate security measures.

section5.title: 5. Payments and refunds
section5.content: Payments are processed securely through Stripe. Once payment is made and the report is unlocked, no refunds will be issued as the service has been fully delivered.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual property
section6.content: All content, design, and code of SecureScan is property of its creators. Copying, modifying, or distributing the service without authorization is not permitted.

section7.title: 7. Modifications
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication on the website.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us at:
